items.summary: In the Footer component (frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx), update the Facebook, Instagram, and YouTube social media link elements to use the following real URLs and open in a new tab: YouTube → https://youtube.com/@evergreengamerz?si=2Bqwy16GG-4GhUj-, Facebook → https://www.facebook.com/share/1AWvNBtfuD/, Instagram → https://www.instagram.com/evergreenhub2026?igsh=bm1icXo1bWxrNTMw. Each link must have target='_blank' and rel='noopener noreferrer'.

In the InstagramSection component (frontend/src/components/InstagramSection.tsx), update the Instagram follow/view-profile links to use the real URL https://www.instagram.com/evergreenhub2026?igsh=bm1icXo1bWxrNTMw with target='_blank' and rel='noopener noreferrer'.

In the YouTubeSection component (frontend/src/components/YouTubeSection.tsx), update the subscribe button and any channel links to use the real YouTube channel URL https://youtube.com/@evergreengamerz?si=2Bqwy16GG-4GhUj- with target='_blank' and rel='noopener noreferrer'.

Scan all remaining frontend components and pages (including FacebookSection.tsx, Header.tsx, MobileSidebar.tsx, AboutUs.tsx, and any other files containing social media links) and update any placeholder or empty Facebook, Instagram, and YouTube links with the real URLs: YouTube → https://youtube.com/@evergreengamerz?si=2Bqwy16GG-4GhUj-, Facebook → https://www.facebook.com/share/1AWvNBtfuD/, Instagram → https://www.instagram.com/evergreenhub2026?igsh=bm1icXo1bWxrNTMw. All links must open in a new tab with rel='noopener noreferrer'.
